price: A ku n yín) sìn títí di ọjọá hu pátápátá.n ní Ọjọ́ Àjíǹde.́ wọn gbàgbé Allāhu.ò níí fún ẹnì kan ní (ìwà rere yìí) àfi àwọn tó ṣe sùúrù. A kò níí fún ẹnì kan sẹ́ àfi olórí-ire ńlá.
arabic: وَمَا يُلَقَّىٰهَآ إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ صَبَرُواْ وَمَا يُلَقَّىٰهَآ إِلَّا ذُو حَظٍّ عَظِيمٖ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wamā yulaqqāhā illā alladhīna ṣabarū wamā yulaqqāhā illā dhū ḥaẓẓin ʿaẓīmin
